NAME: LECTURE

NAME: LECTURE
DESCRIPTION: From an empire to a republic| from communism to socialist-style capitalism| few countries have ever witnessed so much change in a hundred year period as China during the twentieth century. NAME: EUROPE: 1890-1945

DESCRIPTION: See primary department (URBS) for a complete course description.
